channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Reanimator/The Necromancer
channel.description:
K E K, for got the category
># [color=Lightblue] The Reanimator [/color] > **Blue Dragon Support** >*Passive:Once More*-When you get killed at night you become a Blue Dragon aligned Death Knight as if you used Improved Reanimation *Day Ability:Improved Reanimation*-When you reanimate tonight you give them 2 Guards and 2 Cold Steels-1 use(Will not be used if jailed or occupied in anyway shape or form) *Night Ability:Reanimate*-You make a death knight with one cold steel and 1 guard which you can use one or the other (can't use Cold Steel and Guard in one death knight)-3 uses
># [color=purple]The Necromancer[/color] >**Unseen Support(Offensive?)** *Passive:Once More*-When you get lynched you become an Unseen Aligned Death Kight with a 1 shot Cold Steel *Passive:Dark Words*-Your dead faction members may speak with living ones *Night Ability:The Bones of The Unseen*-You make an Unseen Aligned Death Knight out of a dead ally, they can either protect an Unseen Member or Cold Steel once-3 uses
CHANGE LOG 2/16-Edited Once More for the Reanimator 2/16-Added The Unseen Converted Class

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Reanimator/The Necromancer
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
I’d say if the Death Knights had some lesser power, it could work. If they could communicate with the living, an investigative power could work.

I’d personally recommend occupation as a power, so it doesn’t kill people, but has an effect without needing to communicate. It would be ideal if it bypassed immunity, so it could work on anything. That way, it has an effect on the game without being too powerful.

Read full topic

item.description:
Just saying, that’s a lot of death knights. Don’t like it very much.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Reanimator/The Necromancer
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
I’m trying to understand the best I can.

But if I interpret it one way it’s a boring class to play, and if I interpret it the other way it is OP.

Also it’s easier to explain where someone is wrong than to yell at them. It tends to also make them more receptive.

Read full topic

item.description:
correct. I yell because it doesn’t seem to be understood

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Reanimator/The Necromancer
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
If you have 2 dead unseen, then you get 2 extra kills. If you have 3 dead unseen, you get 3 extra kills.

Also, yelling doesn’t help make your point.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Reanimator/The Necromancer
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
thing is, EACH DEAD UNSEEN MAY BE RESSURECTED ONCE, so if you have 1 dead Unseen you can get 1 extra kill

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Reanimator/The Necromancer
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
That can be 3 cold steels, which is 3 extra kills. The only class that gives extra kills now is Sellsword, and it only gives one kill. Converting the Reanimator would give you 3 extra kills, in addition to reducing BD numbers, which converting the Mercenary doesn’t.

The only balanced number of uses is 1, and that doesn’t make for an interesting class.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Reanimator/The Necromancer
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
I’m trying to say “You may ressurect each dead unseen once” infinite uses

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Reanimator/The Necromancer
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
It would work, but having a one use ability and then doing nothing else isn’t exactly engaging. You would just do one thing, and then nothing else.

It would work if you were already dead, but when you’re alive, you generally need at least a few uses of your power.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Reanimator/The Necromancer
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
If each dead unseen can be rezzd once would that be fair?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Reanimator/The Necromancer
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Yeah, and what I’m saying is that 4 extra kills for Unseen is a lot. They aren’t even delayed like Assassin poison. It is just not a balanced ability.

Read full topic

reading is fun you should try it

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Reanimator/The Necromancer
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Reanimator seems really powerful. DK has 3 ability uses, but the Reanimator can make 3 DKs, with 6 uses total. That doesn’t even count Improved reanimation or Once More, which can get you up to 10.

As with the Necromancer, if each reanimated Unseen can kill once, and if you get executed you use it on yourself, that’s a whole 4 extra kills for unseen.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Reanimator/The Necromancer
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
I don’t support this class idea. Almost all classes give you direct feedback like investigatives/offensives or feel very powerful like knight/hunter. They all have a very direct impact, instead of this class that gets all their impact second-hand. Not to mention that they have zero strategic insight needed outside of this player has cleaner logs so better res this one over the other dead BD. Once More also rewards BD for lynching one of their own, which is bad gameplay design in my opinion. Not only that, but it also makes it a bad fakeclaim for scum, because the risk of exeing an actual reanimator isn’t even a bad thing. It also requires a rework of current Physician and possibly Psychic.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Reanimator/The Necromancer
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
K E K, for got the category

The Reanimator

Blue Dragon Support
Passive:Once More-When you get killed at night you become a Blue Dragon aligned Death Knight as if you used Improved Reanimation
Day Ability:Improved Reanimation-When you reanimate tonight you give them 2 Guards and 2 Cold Steels-1 use(Will not be used if jailed or occupied in anyway shape or form)
Night Ability:Reanimate-You make a death knight with one cold steel and 1 guard which you can use one or the other (can’t use Cold Steel and Guard in one death knight)-3 uses

The Necromancer

Unseen Support(Offensive?)
Passive:Once More-When you get lynched you become an Unseen Aligned Death Kight with a 1 shot Cold Steel
Passive:Dark Words-Your dead faction members may speak with living ones
Night Ability:The Bones of The Unseen-You make an Unseen Aligned Death Knight out of a dead ally, they can either protect an Unseen Member or Cold Steel once-3 uses

CHANGE LOG
2/16-Edited Once More for the Reanimator
2/16-Added The Unseen Converted Class

Read full topic
